reviewText: My kids love baseball movies. We used this set as a gift for friends on my son's baseball team. These are now a favorite with my kids.
Perfect. 8, 10, 13 yr olds all like perfect game
The Perfect Game was a five star but Home Run Showdown was no more that three stars at best.
The  "Perfect Game" is a great movie based on a true story about "Little League World Series". I loved every minute of it.

Wonderful collection of baseball stories.  Purchased for my 8yr old grandson, the family watches the movies over and over again.
Very entertaining for the whole family, good clean fun!
The Perfect Game is one of my favorite movies.  I had seen it on Hallmark Channel on TV and so when I found the DVD doubleheader I was thrilled.  2 Great movies.
The Perfect Game is a real feel good, underdogs win it all kind of movie.  The Home Run movie was a nice bonus.
Excellent product. Grandkids love this movie.
This was on my nephews wish list
The kids and myself enjoyed both movies . The Perfect Game was a wonderful movie ,
I put ok because I gave it as a gift. heard nothing back

My son really liked The Perfect Game and when he wore out that movie, I thought this looked like a great purchase. The second movie, Home Run Showdown was NOT liked. My son did not like all the swearing, he was 7 at the time. The Perfect Game and The Home Run Showdown should not be put together because they are not the same rating. The second was actually not rated. I was disappointed that they were put together in a pack. The Perfect Game is a favorite movie in our house.
